# Basic Statistical Concepts {#stat-concepts}

## Data types

* Categorical data (qualitative)
    - nominal (e.g. male, female, ...)
    - ordinal (e.g. low, medium, high)
* Numerical data (quantitative)
    - discrete (e.g. counts)
    - continuous (e.g. measurements)

## Distributions

* Centre
    - mean
    - median
* Spread
    - range
    - quantiles
    - variance
    - standard deviation
* Shape
    - modality
    - symmetry
* Theoretical distributions
    - Gaussian (normal)
    - Poisson
    - Binomial
